attributes.action: STOP DEVELOPMENT OF ADASTRAL PARK AND ADJOINING LAND, MARTLESHAM, IPSWICH, IP5 3RE
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: BT HAVE APPLIED TO REDEVELOP THE COUNTRYSIDE OF SUFFOLK INTO A NEW COMMUNITY, LOCAL ROAD NETWORKS AND A MAJOR HOUSING DEVELOPMENT OF 2,000 HOUSES. WE HAVE LESS AND LESS OF THE COUNTRYSIDE LEFT IN THE UK, THIS AREA IS FULL OF BEAUTY AND NATURE, WOODS, FIELDS AND A PLACE TO 'GET AWAY' FROM THE NOISE AND POLLULTION OF THE CITIES. DON'T LET THE FAT CATS TAKE OUR COUNTRYSIDE AWAY. WE DON'T NEED 2,000 NEW HOUSES IN THIS AREA, PRICES ARE FALLING ON CURRENT HOUSE SALES AND THERE ARE FEW HOUSES BEING SOLD. WHY DO WE NEED YET MORE?

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
